channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole and raised curb, 4th June
item.description:
Asphalt has eroded and cut into edge of driveable road, causing unexpected narrowing of road surface on lead up to the roundabout, with a raised curb just after this pothole. This unsurfaced corner of road caused ~10mm diameter hole in tyre side wall and scraped wheel alloy. This resulted in immediate drop in pressure to 0. Had to pull onto hard shoulder of slip road of M5 Northbound to await recovery.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Golden Valley Junction, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nettles taking over the pavement. So many children walk down here and baby in pushchair would struggle with a double pushchair, 4th June

The alley way Binyon road and abbey view - Winchcombe

item.title: Tall weeds making it very dangerous to pull onto road, 4th June
item.description:
Between Broadclyst and Broadwell. This is the same problem as reported on 20 April but about which nothing has done and no update has been provided.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 4th June
item.description:
Customer has mentioned that the Foliage growing off the bottom of the tree is causing a viewing obstruction and needs cutting back to clear the view of oncoming traffic.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I live at 38 Griffiths Ave Photos do not show how bad it looks Worst Iâ€™ve ever seen All this grass will wash down drains and much rarely get cleaned & looks & road looks horrendous, 4th June

Mr & Mrs Axton 38 Griffiths Ave GL51 7BL WE HAVE LIVED HERE SINCE 1985 AND HAVE NEVER SEEN SUCH A SHAMEFUL MESS NO PRIDE IS TAKEN ANY MORE.WE ARE ASHAMED OF GCC

item.title: Overgrowth blocking access to PROW, 4th June
item.description:
Section of footpath from Old Gloucester Road blocked by overgrowth. No other route available to bypass private land on one side and building site for new housing development on the other.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
